language.welcomeTitle: Welcome to the DsHidMini Driver Installer!
language.welcomeIntro: This wizard will install DsHidMini drivers for your DsHidMini USB device.
language.installHeaderTitle: Installing the software for your DsHidMini device...
language.finishTitle: Congratulations! You are finished installing your DsHidMini device.
language.finishText: DsHidMini drivers are now installed for your DsHidMini USB device.
